source_caption_data.pre_caption: This extreme wide shot presents a pixel-art farm scene from a static, high-angle, top-down perspective. Initially, a character is positioned in the center of the frame, in the middle ground, just below a wooden farmhouse. The character moves slightly down and left, briefly standing directly on top of a small tree sapling in the center of the frame. They then walk to the right, stopping beside a tilled plot of land located in the middle ground, to the right of the farmhouse. The character proceeds to use a hoe on the ground to the right of this plot, extending the tilled area. The scene is populated with trees, rocks, and grass in the foreground, middle ground, and background, with another building visible in the top-left background. A user interface with a clock and currency is fixed in the top-right corner, and a toolbar is at the bottom of the frame.

If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

A toolbar at the bottom-center displays various tool icons. In the bottom left, temporary small boxes show collected items such as "Fiber." In the bottom right, there is a narrow bar with an "E" on top.**

Please note that the **main subjects exhibit atypical posture or anatomy**, so the description should reflect this.
